data.prayer: Please, convict the 456,826 believers in Abidjan, Côte d‘Ivoire to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Abidjan, Côte d‘Ivoire
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Abidjan access to a Bible in their own language.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 10 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Abidjan. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Abidjan, Côte d‘Ivoire to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Senoufo, Dyimini people. Make the Senoufo, Dyimini people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Abidjan.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 456,826 believers in Abidjan against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.section_summary:
the state of Abidjan, Côte d‘Ivoire has a population of 4,707,400.

We estimate Abidjan has 456,826 people who might know Jesus, 1,006,400 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,244,174 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 10 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Abidjan to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.
